CustomField.description:
Three fields/values from the Account object help drive product selection within the quote/cart. These fields/values are: 1 Customer/Account Type (Billing_Account_Type__c) 2 Region/Pricebook 3 Tier (Billing_Tier__c)
This particular field is stamped with the customer/account type at time of opty creation, via workflow, and will pass it down to all quotes created from this opty. The quote level field, Billing_Account_Type__c, will thereby receive this value and help drive product selection in the cart.
Field values that will be stamped on this will include: Hiring Client/Contractor Operator, Hiring Client Account Consolidation, Contractor, and Monarch. (These values are similar to the types of opportunities available) Help Text
CustomField.label: Billing Account Type
